purpose: Facilitate the creation and orchestration of AI agents using a lightweight framework.
principle: Builds on flow-based programming principles to enable agentic workflows and interactions between large language models.
reusability: Designed for easy integration with existing systems; supports modular agent composition and orchestration.
limitations: As an alpha release, it may have limited documentation, stability issues, and lack of extensive real-world testing.
name: PocketFlow
description: Pocket Flow: 100-line LLM framework. Let Agents build Agents!
highlight: A compact 100-line LLM framework enabling agents to autonomously build and orchestrate other agents.
